name: 吳牧恩
objective:
本課程分為上下學期，介紹如何將金融操作方式，以明確演算法去定義、描述，進而用R語言、XQ去模擬、執行。內容包括: 程式交易概論、交易策略研發、回測系統、資金管理。此外，本課程邀請嘉實資訊經理擔任業師課程指導。嘉實資訊為國內最大財金資訊軟體公司，其業師將帶領同學銜接上學期課程，透過XQ交易系統進行撰寫XS語法。

This course is divided into the two parts. We introduce how to trade in financial market. We define and describe the algorithm, and then uses R language and XQ to simulate and execute. The contents include: Introduction to program trading, trading strategy development, back-testing system, and money management. In addition, this course invites the management of Sysjust company to serve as a course guide. Sysjust is the largest financial information software company in Taiwan. The purpose is to let students to connect to the theory and practice.
